sqlMap.select:
select count(1) from crm.crm_tb_order_total t left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_org o on o.org_id = s.org_id left join crm.crm_tb_customer c on t.cust_id = c.cust_id where 1=1
c.cust_id =#custId#
t.cloud_id =#isOffice#
c.cust_type =#custType#
c.cust_state =#custState#
c.cust_name like #custName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.create_date >=to_date(#beginDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
t.create_date <=to_date(#endDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
c.contact_name like #contactName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.user_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.user_id =#userId#
t.cloud_id in #custKunnrs[]#
s.org_id in #orgIds[]#

select count(1) from crm.crm_tb_order_detail d left join crm.crm_tb_sku k on d.sku_id = k.sku_id where 1=1 and d.status='U'
d.order_id =#orderId#

select t.order_id as orderId , t.total_price||t.total_price_unit_desc as totalPrice, t.order_quantity as orderQuntity, c.cust_name as custName, o.org_name as orgName, t.ORDER_STATUS as orderStatus, t.ORDER_FUNDS_STATUS as orderFundsStatus, t.ORDER_DESCRIPTION as orderDesc, s.user_name as userName, t.planned_delivery_date as plannedDeliveryDate, t.real_delivery_date as realDeliveryDate, t.order_create_date as orderCreateDate, t.create_date as createDate, t.status as status from crm.crm_tb_order_total t left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_org o on o.org_id = s.org_id left join crm.crm_tb_customer c on t.cust_id = c.cust_id where 1=1
c.cust_id =#custId#
d.order_detail_id =#orderDetailId#
t.cloud_id =#isOffice#
c.cust_type =#custType#
c.cust_state =#custState#
c.cust_name like #custName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.create_date >=to_date(#beginDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
t.create_date <=to_date(#endDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
c.contact_name like #contactName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.user_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.cloud_id in #custKunnrs[]#
t.user_id =#userId#
s.org_id in #orgIds[]#
order by t.create_date desc

select d.order_detail_id as orderDetailId, d.quantity as quantity, d.order_type as orderType, d.total_price as DtotalPrice, d.price as price, k.sku_name as skuName, d.real_quantity as realQuantity, t.order_id as orderId , t.total_price||t.total_price_unit_desc as totalPrice, t.order_quantity as orderQuntity, c.cust_name as custName, o.org_name as orgName, t.ORDER_STATUS as orderStatus, t.ORDER_FUNDS_STATUS as orderFundsStatus, t.ORDER_DESCRIPTION as orderDesc, s.user_name as userName, t.planned_delivery_date as plannedDeliveryDate, t.real_delivery_date as realDeliveryDate, t.order_create_date as orderCreateDate, t.create_date as createDate, t.status as status from crm.crm_tb_order_detail d left join crm.crm_tb_order_total t on t.order_id = d.order_id left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_org o on o.org_id = s.org_id left join crm.crm_tb_customer c on t.cust_id = c.cust_id left join crm.crm_tb_sku k on k.sku_id = d.sku_id where 1=1 and d.status='U'
c.cust_id =#custId#
t.cloud_id =#isOffice#
c.cust_type =#custType#
c.cust_state =#custState#
c.cust_name like #custName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.create_date >=to_date(#beginDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
t.create_date <=to_date(#endDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
c.contact_name like #contactName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.user_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.user_id =#userId#
t.cloud_id in #custKunnrs[]#
s.org_id in #orgIds[]#
order by t.create_date desc

select t.order_id as orderId , t.total_price as totalPrice, t.order_quantity as orderQuntity, c.cust_name as custName, o.org_name as orgName, t.ORDER_STATUS as orderStatus, t.ORDER_FUNDS_STATUS as orderFundsStatus, t.ORDER_DESCRIPTION as orderDesc, s.user_name as userName, t.planned_delivery_date as plannedDeliveryDate, t.real_delivery_date as realDeliveryDate, t.order_create_date as orderCreateDate, t.create_date as createDate, t.status as status, t.cloud_id as isOffice from crm.crm_tb_order_total t left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_org o on o.org_id = s.org_id left join crm.crm_tb_customer c on t.cust_id = c.cust_id where 1=1
t.order_id =#orderId#

select t.order_id as orderId , t.total_price as totalPrice, t.order_quantity as orderQuntity, c.cust_name as custName, o.org_name as orgName, t.ORDER_STATUS as orderStatus, t.ORDER_FUNDS_STATUS as orderFundsStatus, t.ORDER_DESCRIPTION as orderDesc, s.user_name as userName, t.planned_delivery_date as plannedDeliveryDate, t.real_delivery_date as realDeliveryDate, t.order_create_date as orderCreateDate, t.create_date as createDate, t.status as status, s.bus_mobilephone as busPhone, k.kunnr as kunnr, k.name1 as kunnrName from crm.crm_tb_order_total t left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_org o on o.org_id = s.org_id left join crm.crm_tb_customer c on t.cust_id = c.cust_id left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr k on k.kunnr = c.cust_kunnr where 1=1
t.order_id =#orderId#
sqlMap.update:
update crm.crm_tb_order_total d set d.MODIFY_DATE = sysdate, d.LAST_MODIFY_USER = #lastModifyUser#
d.cust_id =#custId#
d.status =#status#
d.order_status =#orderStatus#
d.order_funds_status =#orderFundsStatus#
d.ORDER_DESCRIPTION =#orderDesc#
d.total_price =#totalPrice#
where d.order_id = #orderId#

update crm.crm_tb_order_detail d set d.MODIFY_DATE = sysdate, d.MODIFY_USER_ID = #lastModifyUser#
d.quantity =#quantity#
d.sku_id =#skuId#
d.price =#price#
d.real_quantity =#realQuantity#
d.order_type =#orderType#
d.total_price =#totalPrice#
d.unit_desc =#unitDesc#
where d.order_detail_id = #orderDetailId#
sqlMap.select:
select d.order_detail_id as orderDetailId, k.sku_name as skuName, d.quantity as quantity, d.real_quantity as realQuantity, d.price as price, d.order_type as orderType , d.total_price as totalPrice, d.unit_desc as unitDesc, k.sku_code as skuCode from crm.crm_tb_order_detail d left join crm.crm_tb_sku k on d.sku_id = k.sku_id where d.STATUS='U'
d.order_id =#orderId#

select count(s.sku_name) from crm.crm_tb_sku s where s.product_type = '1' and s.status='U'
s.sku_name like #skuName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.cloudid in (#skuCompany#,'0000000000')

select distinct s.sku_id as skuId, s.sku_name as skuName, s.sku_unit as skuUnit from crm.crm_tb_sku s where s.product_type = '1' and s.status='U'
s.sku_name like #skuName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.cloudid in (#skuCompany#,'0000000000')
order by s.sku_id
select crm.crm_seq_order_total.currval from dual
sqlMap.insert:
select crm.crm_seq_order_total.nextval as orderId from dual
insert into crm.crm_tb_order_total (order_id, total_price, total_price_unit_desc, order_description, order_quantity, cust_id, org_id, user_id, status, last_modify_user, order_create_date, create_date, modify_date, order_status, order_funds_status, cloud_id) values (#orderId#, #totalPrice#, '元', #orderDesc#, '0.0', #custId#, #orgId#, #userId#, 'U', #userId#, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, 'N', 'N', #isOffice#)

select crm.crm_seq_order_detail.nextval as orderDetailId from dual
insert into crm.crm_tb_order_detail (order_id, order_detail_id, quantity, unit_code, unit_desc, price_unit_desc, price, total_price, status, create_date, modify_date, sku_id, order_type) values (#orderId#, #orderDetailId#, #quantity#, #unitCode#, #unitDesc#, '元', #price#, #totalPrice#, 'U', sysdate, sysdate, #skuId#, #orderType#)
sqlMap.select: select t.lifnr from basis.basis_tb_kunnremp_info t where t.emp_code = #empCode#
select k.kunnr from crm.crm_tb_kunnrbusiness k where k.business_competent_id in (select s.id from basis.basis_tb_station_user s where s.user_id = #userId#)

select count(*) from ( select sum(d.total_price) as totalPrice, sum(d.quantity) as quantity, sum(d.real_quantity) as realQuantity, r.kunnr as kunnr, max(d.unit_desc) as unitDesc, max(r.name1) as kunnrName, k.sku_name as skuName, t.user_id as userId, max(p.user_name) as userName, max(s.station_name) as stationName
from crm.crm_tb_order_detail d left join crm.crm_tb_order_total t on d.order_id = t.order_id left join crm.crm_tb_sku k on d.sku_id = k.sku_id left join crm.crm_tb_customer c on c.cust_id=t.cust_id left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr r on r.kunnr = c.cust_kunnr left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw p on p.user_id=t.user_id left join (select su.user_id,su.station_id from basis.basis_tb_station_user su where su.is_main_station='Y') su on t.user_id=su.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_stations s on su.station_id=s.station_id where d.status='U' and t.status='U'
t.cloud_id =#isOffice#
k.sku_id = #skuId#
p.org_id in #orgIds[]#
t.cloud_id in #custKunnrs[]#
d.create_date >= #startDate#
d.create_date <= #endDate#+1
s.station_name is not null
s.station_name is null
group by r.kunnr,k.sku_name,t.user_id order by r.kunnr,k.sku_name)

select sum(d.total_price) as totalPrice, sum(d.quantity) as quantity, sum(d.real_quantity) as realQuantity, r.kunnr as kunnr, max(d.unit_desc) as unitDesc, max(r.name1) as kunnrName, k.sku_name as skuName, t.user_id as userId, max(p.user_name) as userName, max(s.station_name) as stationName, max(c.cust_name) as custName, max(k.sku_code) as skuCode
from crm.crm_tb_order_detail d left join crm.crm_tb_order_total t on d.order_id = t.order_id left join crm.crm_tb_sku k on d.sku_id = k.sku_id left join crm.crm_tb_customer c on c.cust_id=t.cust_id left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr r on r.kunnr = c.cust_kunnr left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw p on p.user_id=t.user_id left join (select su.user_id,su.station_id from basis.basis_tb_station_user su where su.is_main_station='Y') su on t.user_id=su.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_stations s on su.station_id=s.station_id where d.status='U' and t.status='U'
t.cloud_id =#isOffice#
k.sku_id = #skuId#
p.org_id in #orgIds[]#
t.cloud_id in #custKunnrs[]#
d.create_date >= #startDate#
d.create_date <= #endDate#+1
s.station_name is not null
s.station_name is null
group by r.kunnr,k.sku_name,t.user_id order by r.kunnr,k.sku_name

select count(*) from crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_total t left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_org o on o.org_id = s.org_id left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr c on t.kunnr = c.kunnr where 1=1
c.kunnr =#kunnr#
t.cloud_id =#isOffice#
c.cust_type =#custType#
c.cust_state =#custState#
c.name1 like #custName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.create_date >=to_date(#beginDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
t.create_date <=to_date(#endDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
c.name3 like #contactName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.user_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.user_id =#userId#
t.cloud_id in #custKunnrs[]#
s.org_id in #orgIds[]#

select count(*) from crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_detail d left join crm.crm_tb_sku k on d.sku_id = k.sku_id where 1=1 and d.status='U'
d.order_id =#orderId#

select t.order_id as orderId , t.total_price||t.total_price_unit_desc as totalPrice, t.order_quantity as orderQuntity, c.name1 as kunnrName, o.org_name as orgName, t.ORDER_STATUS as orderStatus, t.ORDER_FUNDS_STATUS as orderFundsStatus, t.ORDER_DESCRIPTION as orderDesc, s.user_name as userName, t.planned_delivery_date as plannedDeliveryDate, t.real_delivery_date as realDeliveryDate, t.order_create_date as orderCreateDate, t.create_date as createDate, t.status as status from crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_total t left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_org o on o.org_id = s.org_id left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr c on t.kunnr = c.kunnr where 1=1
c.kunnr =#kunnr#
d.order_detail_id =#orderDetailId#
t.cloud_id =#isOffice#
c.name3 =#name2#
c.name1 like #custName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.create_date >=to_date(#beginDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
t.create_date <=to_date(#endDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
c.contact_name like #contactName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.user_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.cloud_id in #custKunnrs[]#
t.user_id =#userId#
s.org_id in #orgIds[]#
order by t.create_date desc

select d.order_detail_id as orderDetailId, d.quantity as quantity, d.order_type as orderType, d.total_price as DtotalPrice, d.price as price, k.sku_name as skuName, d.real_quantity as realQuantity, t.order_id as orderId , t.total_price||t.total_price_unit_desc as totalPrice, t.order_quantity as orderQuntity, c.cust_name as custName, o.org_name as orgName, t.ORDER_STATUS as orderStatus, t.ORDER_FUNDS_STATUS as orderFundsStatus, t.ORDER_DESCRIPTION as orderDesc, s.user_name as userName, t.planned_delivery_date as plannedDeliveryDate, t.real_delivery_date as realDeliveryDate, t.order_create_date as orderCreateDate, t.create_date as createDate, t.status as status from crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_detail d left join crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_total t on t.order_id = d.order_id left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_org o on o.org_id = s.org_id left join crm.crm_tb_customer c on t.cust_id = c.cust_id left join crm.crm_tb_sku k on k.sku_id = d.sku_id where 1=1 and d.status='U'
c.cust_id =#custId#
t.cloud_id =#isOffice#
c.cust_type =#custType#
c.cust_state =#custState#
c.cust_name like #custName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.create_date >=to_date(#beginDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
t.create_date <=to_date(#endDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
c.contact_name like #contactName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.user_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.user_id =#userId#
t.cloud_id in #custKunnrs[]#
s.org_id in #orgIds[]#
order by t.create_date desc

select t.order_id as orderId , t.total_price as totalPrice, t.order_quantity as orderQuntity, c.name1 as kunnrName, o.org_name as orgName, t.ORDER_STATUS as orderStatus, t.ORDER_FUNDS_STATUS as orderFundsStatus, t.ORDER_DESCRIPTION as orderDesc, s.user_name as userName, t.planned_delivery_date as plannedDeliveryDate, t.real_delivery_date as realDeliveryDate, t.order_create_date as orderCreateDate, to_char(t.create_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as createDate, t.status as status, t.cloud_id as isOffice, t.name2 as name2, t.mobile as mobile, t.address as address, t.car_type as carType from crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_total t left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_org o on o.org_id = s.org_id left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr c on t.kunnr = c.kunnr where 1=1
t.order_id =#orderId#

select t.order_id as orderId , t.total_price as totalPrice, t.order_quantity as orderQuntity, c.cust_name as custName, o.org_name as orgName, t.ORDER_STATUS as orderStatus, t.ORDER_FUNDS_STATUS as orderFundsStatus, t.ORDER_DESCRIPTION as orderDesc, s.user_name as userName, t.planned_delivery_date as plannedDeliveryDate, t.real_delivery_date as realDeliveryDate, t.order_create_date as orderCreateDate, t.create_date as createDate, t.status as status from crm.crm_tb_order_total t left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_org o on o.org_id = s.org_id left join crm.crm_tb_customer c on t.cust_id = c.cust_id where 1=1
t.order_id =#orderId#
sqlMap.update:
update crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_total d set d.MODIFY_DATE = sysdate, d.LAST_MODIFY_USER = #lastModifyUser#
d.kunnr =#kunnr#
d.status =#status#
d.order_status =#orderStatus#
d.order_funds_status =#orderFundsStatus#
d.ORDER_DESCRIPTION =#orderDesc#
d.total_price =#totalPrice#
d.name2 =#name2#
d.mobile =#mobile#
d.address =#address#
d.car_type =#carType#
where d.order_id = #orderId#

update crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_detail d set d.MODIFY_DATE = sysdate, d.MODIFY_USER_ID = #lastModifyUser#
d.quantity =#quantity#
d.sku_id =#skuId#
d.price =#price#
d.real_quantity =#realQuantity#
d.order_type =#orderType#
d.total_price =#totalPrice#
where d.order_detail_id = #orderDetailId#
sqlMap.select:
select d.order_detail_id as orderDetailId, k.sku_name as skuName, d.quantity as quantity, d.real_quantity as realQuantity, d.price as price, d.order_type as orderType , d.total_price as totalPrice from crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_detail d left join crm.crm_tb_sku k on d.sku_id = k.sku_id where 1=1
d.order_id =#orderId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_total (order_id, total_price, total_price_unit_desc, order_description, order_quantity, kunnr, org_id, user_id, status, last_modify_user, order_create_date, create_date, modify_date, order_status, order_funds_status, name2, mobile, address, car_type) values (#orderId#, #totalPrice#, '元', #orderDesc#, '0.0', #kunnr#, #orgId#, #userId#, 'U', #userId#, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, 'N', 'N', #name2#, #mobile#, #address#, #carType#)

select crm.crm_seq_order_kunnr_detail.nextval as orderDetailId from dual
insert into crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_detail (order_id, order_detail_id, quantity, unit_code, unit_desc, price_unit_desc, price, total_price, status, create_date, modify_date, sku_id, order_type) values (#orderId#, #orderDetailId#, #quantity#, #unitCode#, #unitDesc#, '元', #price#, #totalPrice#, 'U', sysdate, sysdate, #skuId#, #orderType#)
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from ( select sum(d.total_price) as totalPrice, sum(d.quantity) as quantity, sum(d.real_quantity) as realQuantity, t.cloud_id as kunnr, d.unit_desc as unitDesc, r.name1 as kunnrName, k.sku_name as skuName
from crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_detail d left join crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_total t on d.order_id = t.order_id left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join crm.crm_tb_sku k on d.sku_id = k.sku_id left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr r on r.kunnr = t.cloud_id where 1=1
t.cloud_id =#isOffice#
k.sku_id = #skuId#
s.org_id in #orgIds[]#
t.cloud_id in #custKunnrs[]#
d.create_date >= #startDate#
d.create_date <= #endDate#+1
group by t.cloud_id,r.name1,k.sku_name,d.unit_desc order by t.cloud_id,k.sku_name)

select sum(d.total_price) as totalPrice, sum(d.quantity) as quantity, sum(d.real_quantity) as realQuantity, t.cloud_id as kunnr, d.unit_desc as unitDesc, r.name1 as kunnrName, k.sku_name as skuName
from crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_detail d left join crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_total t on d.order_id = t.order_id left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw s on s.user_id = t.user_id left join crm.crm_tb_sku k on d.sku_id = k.sku_id left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr r on r.kunnr = t.cloud_id where 1=1
t.cloud_id =#isOffice#
k.sku_id = #skuId#
s.org_id in #orgIds[]#
t.cloud_id in #custKunnrs[]#
d.create_date >= #startDate#
d.create_date <= #endDate#+1
group by t.cloud_id,r.name1,k.sku_name,d.unit_desc order by t.cloud_id,k.sku_name
select max(order_id) from crm.crm_tb_order_kunnr_total

select count(*) from crm.crm_tb_order_account t left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr k on t.kunnr = k.kunnr left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw u on u.user_id = t.user_id where 1=1
t.user_id = #userId#
t.status = #status#
t.account_id = #accountId#
t.create_date >= #startDate#
t.create_date <= #endDate#+1
t.kunnr = #kunnr#

select t.account_id as accountId, t.description as accountDesc, t.price as price, t.fee as fee, t.user_id as userId, t.status as status, t.create_date as createDate, t.kunnr as kunnr, t.success_num as successNum, t.pay_type as payType, t.card_type as cardType, t.success_date as successDate, t.in_sap as inSap, k.name1 as kunnrName, u.user_name as userName from crm.crm_tb_order_account t left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr k on t.kunnr = k.kunnr left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw u on u.user_id = t.user_id where 1=1
t.user_id = #userId#
t.status = #status#
t.account_id = #accountId#
t.create_date >= #startDate#
t.create_date <= #endDate#+1
t.kunnr = #kunnr#
t.in_sap is null
order by t.account_id desc

select t.account_id as accountId, t.description as accountDesc, t.price as price, t.fee as fee, t.user_id as userId, t.status as status, t.create_date as createDate, t.kunnr as kunnr, k.name1 as kunnrName, t.success_num as successNum, t.pay_type as payType, t.card_type as cardType, t.success_date as successDate, t.in_sap as inSap from crm.crm_tb_order_account t left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr k on k.kunnr=t.kunnr where 1=1
t.user_id = #userId#
t.status = #status#
t.account_id = #accountId#
t.kunnr = #kunnr#
sqlMap.insert: insert into crm.crm_tb_order_account( account_id, price, description, user_id, status, create_date, pay_type, card_type, kunnr, success_num, fee ) values ( #accountId#, #price#, #accountDesc#, #userId#, #status#, sysdate, #payType#, #cardType#, #kunnr#, #successNum#, #fee# )
sqlMap.update:
update crm.crm_tb_order_account t
t.user_id = #userId#
t.status = #status#
t.price = #price#
t.description = #accountDesc#
t.pay_type = #payType#
t.success_num = #successNum#
t.kunnr = #kunnr#
t.success_date = #successDate#
t.in_sap = #inSap#
t.account_refund_id = #accountRefundId#
where t.account_id =#accountId#
sqlMap.select:
select count(1) from crm.crm_tb_order_printformat t left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr t1 on t.kunnr = t1.kunnr left join basis.basis_tb_dict t2 on t.properties_code = t2.item_value left join basis.basis_tb_dict_type t3 on t2.dict_type_id = t3.dict_type_id left join basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info t4 on t.operator = t4.emp_id where t3.dict_type_value = 'app@orderFormat' and t3.dict_type_state = 'U' and t2.item_state = 'U' and t.status = 'U'
t.format_id = #format_id#
t.kunnr = #kunnr#
t.properties_code = #properties_code#
t1.name1 like #kunnr_name,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t1.org_id =#orgId#
t1.org_id in(select o.org_id from basis.basis_tb_org o where o.state = 'Y' start with o.org_id = #orgId# connect by nocycle prior o.org_id = o.org_parent_id )

select t.format_id, t.kunnr, t1.name1 kunnr_name, t.properties_code, t2.item_name properties_name, t.type, t.order_desc, t.operator, t4.user_name operator_name, t.create_date, t.modify_date, t.memo, t2.remark from crm.crm_tb_order_printformat t left join crm.crm_tb_kunnr t1 on t.kunnr = t1.kunnr left join basis.basis_tb_dict t2 on t.properties_code = t2.item_value left join basis.basis_tb_dict_type t3 on t2.dict_type_id = t3.dict_type_id left join basis.basis_vw_user_psw t4 on t.operator = t4.user_id where t3.dict_type_value = 'app@orderFormat' and t3.dict_type_state = 'U' and t2.item_state = 'U' and t.status = 'U'
t.format_id = #format_id#
t.kunnr = #kunnr#
t1.name1 like #kunnr_name,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.properties_code = #properties_code#
t1.org_id =#orgId#
t1.org_id in(select o.org_id from basis.basis_tb_org o where o.state = 'Y' start with o.org_id = #orgId# connect by nocycle prior o.org_id = o.org_parent_id )
order by t.kunnr,to_number(t.order_desc) asc

select t1.item_name properties_name, t1.item_value properties_code from basis.basis_tb_dict_type t left join basis.basis_tb_dict t1 on t.dict_type_id = t1.dict_type_id where t.dict_type_state = 'U' and t.dict_type_value = 'app@orderFormat' and t1.item_state = 'U'

select t.kunnr, t.name1, t.org_id as orgId, t.org_name as orgName from crm.crm_tb_kunnr t where 1=1
t.kunnr=#kunnr#
t.name1 like #name1,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
t.status=#status#
t.org_id =#orgId#
t.org_id in(select o.org_id from basis.basis_tb_org o where o.state = 'Y' start with o.org_id = #orgId# connect by nocycle prior o.org_id = o.org_parent_id )
sqlMap.update:
update crm.crm_tb_order_printformat t set t.MODIFY_DATE = sysdate, t.MEMO = #memo#
t.OPERATOR =#operator#
t.KUNNR =#kunnr#
t.PROPERTIES_CODE =#properties_code#
t.TYPE =#type#
t.STATUS =#status#
t.ORDER_DESC =#order_desc#
where 1=1
t.FORMAT_ID=#format_id#
t.FORMAT_ID in #format_ids[]#
sqlMap.insert:
select crm.crm_seq_order_format.nextval as format_id from dual
insert into crm.crm_tb_order_printformat (FORMAT_ID, KUNNR, PROPERTIES_CODE, TYPE, ORDER_DESC, OPERATOR, STATUS, MEMO, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) values (#format_id#, #kunnr#, #properties_code#, #type#, #order_desc#, #operator#, #status#, #memo#, sysdate, sysdate)
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from basis.basis_tb_station_user u where u.user_id=#userId# and u.station_id in ('h_zg','h_zg_xn','h_yd')
